attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
instead of using all forms of stealth tax and other vehicle legislation that make it to expensive to own a car, just cut to the chase, make sure only wealthy people can own cars.the wealthy people just absorb the taxes.it does not change their usage of cars.the less well of just can't afford to do that.
make rich people happier get poor people of the roads.
pollution , congestion would dramatically decrease and it would be easier to park

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
